ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You got here at the perfect time!
ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope you have surprises and inspiration in your
adventures today.
ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_01_10: You like my necklace? I think it’s pretty, too!
ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_02_10:
Believe it or not, I run a jewelry shop 
on the side—while also being a kahuna.
ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_03_10:
And sometimes, keeping the raw and rough
edges makes the jewels look fancier!
ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_01_10:
If you ever find yourself interested in jewelry,
come to my shop!
ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_02_10:
The wares might be pricy, but my selection
is top-of-the-line!
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_01_10:
Are you eating properly? Pokémon battles drain
Trainers as well as Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_02_10:
I eat well so I can battle well anyplace
and anytime.
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_03_10:
Maybe that’s why I like a person who
appreciates good food!
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_01_10:
I would totally recommend the Z-sets
you can get in Alola!
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_02_10:
They really pile food onto your plate, and they use
tasty family recipes. They’re my favorite!
ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_03_10:
Though I hear that some people are just after
the Heart Scales that come along with the dish!
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_01_10:
Golem from the Alola region look different 
than ones from other regions.
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_02_10:
They throw electrified rocks.
Isn’t that pretty neat?
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_03_10:
And those electrified rocks shine like jewels and
are really pretty.
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_04_10:
Beautiful and strong! That’s what I really like
about that move.
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_01_10:
There are a lot of Pokémon that you can only
see in the Alola region.
ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_02_10:
If you find any Trainers from Alola, maybe you
can ask them to show you their Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_01_10: My trusty partner is the rough ’n’ tough Lycanroc!
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_02_10:
He’s flexible and kindhearted.
In a way, he’s the opposite of me.
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_03_10:
But that’s why I’m drawn to him.
I think it’s the same for him, too.
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_04_10: That being said, all my Pokémon are adorable!
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_01_10: I like soft and cute things.
ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_02_10: I even collect Stufful and other Pokémon plush.
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_01_10:
I might be the kahuna, but really, I’m just your
average girl, you know?
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_02_10: So you can be more relaxed around me, OK?
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_03_10:
Wouldn’t it make it easier for both of us if
we just acted natural around each other?
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_04_10:
At the least, it would make me happier if we
could be like that.
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_01_10:
Being laid-back is the best for both people and
Pokémon. Always being proper is so tiring.
ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_02_10:
If you’re ever in a jam, talk to each other, and 
when things are calm, laugh with each other. 
That kind of relationship is the best!
ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0701_02_10:
You’ve been working really hard, so here’s a
present from yours truly.
ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t worry about it! I’m munificent like that!
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_01_10:
Thanks to the fact that I’m both a kahuna and a
member of the Elite Four...
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_02_10:
I get to meet all sorts of Trainers, but it’s never
on this kind of scale.
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_03_10:
Thanks to the PML, I’m having so much fun
interacting with Trainers from all over the world.
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_04_10:
You don’t get this kind of experience very often,
so make sure you enjoy yourself while you can!
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_01_10:
With there being so many people from all over
the world...
ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_02_10: maybe I can find somebody special myself.
ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_01_10:
You really do keep growing stronger, don’t you!
It’s really satisfying to watch!
ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_02_10:
At this rate, you might even be able to reach the
apex of all Trainers.
ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_01_10:
Your team members trust you 
because of your strength.
ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_02_10:
Even I’m drawn to your strength and
your personality.
ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_03_10:
I want you to show me more of your Pokémon
battles in the future, too!
ch0051_00_litchi/3001_0701_01_10:
Alola! Today looks like it’s going
to be a lovely day, doesn’t it.
ch0051_00_litchi/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I think I slept in a little too late today...
It’s tough being a grown-up.
ch0051_00_litchi/3003_0701_01_10:
Alola! Have you felt the breeze outside today?
It’s just lovely!
ch0051_00_litchi/3004_0701_01_10:
I’ve got some kahuna errands I need to
run today, but I kinda want to relax and
have fun with you instead!
ch0051_00_litchi/3005_0701_01_10:
Alola! Aren’t you a little young to be out and
about this late?
ch0051_00_litchi/3006_0701_01_10:
The stars are beautiful tonight,
and the air is so clear here.
